name: An AI-designed Game "The Travel Guide"
description:
A Game Made By AI

To validate the idea of AI game designing, we developed this game. More accurately, we invited AI to designed this game. Every assets in this game, including music, script and art, were made by AI.

AI has been constantly progressing over the years, and it's been mature enough to handle the design of a full visual novel game. We managed to made this a reality so that everyone can understand the advantage of designing games with AI, as well as the disadvantage.

Concept And Designing

AI has imagined a world with elves, human and dark elves. There is a superpower country on the east, while another new power is in rise on the west. A peaceful elf country is positioned on the south but they are suffering from rebellion inside.

Prototype Version

We are still validating this concept of designing game with AI.

Chinese Version Only

We are a Chinese development team with little time to make a English translation version.
